snippet: Ivor Robson, whose dulcet Scottish tones have been introducing the players on the first tee at the Open for 40 years, was at a loose end on Saturday because of an unprecedented two-tee start....

headline.print_headline: Half Day for 'Voice of Open' Robson
headline.main: Half Day for 'Voice of Open' Robson

lead_paragraph: Ivor Robson, whose dulcet Scottish tones have been introducing the players on the first tee at the Open for 40 years, was at a loose end on Saturday because of an unprecedented two-tee start.
